reviews.review_content: Maricele has been a TA for Gregory WawroÂ’s Intro to American Politics class something like 5 times, so youÂ’re lucky if you get her.  She is very approachable and helps her sections out with summaries of the most important readings.  She does tend to let sections be controlled by the students, especially ones who want to talk, which can be a plus or a minus.
